title: 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry explains why he's betting against Nvidia, not Meta or Microsoft
full_text:
'Big Short' investor Michael Burry explains why he's betting against Nvidia, not Meta or Microsoft. Michael Burry of "The Big Short" fame said Nvidia is "simply the purest play" for an investor to bet against the AI boom.. Michael BurryJim Spellman/WireImage
  • Michael Burry says he's short Nvidia as it's especially exposed to what he sees as an AI bubble.
